ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Soloing at 20
ygData.msgSnippet: i levelled faster than the learning curve of bards since final release, and never got past level 20 in beta.  also i never soloed, pretty much in a group since
ygData.messageBody:
i levelled faster than the learning curve of bards since final release, and
never got past level 20 in beta. also i never soloed, pretty much in a
group since level 1 and so the all-instrument attack in the 20s was
something i got past without even realizing. so the other night in sebilis
i lmao when i saw:

You have become better at Hand to Hand (14)! =)

Shada Iceheart, L56 Wood Elf Troubador
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr


> You cant have 100 HtH till 30 something. I believe the
> formula is lvl+1 *3.
> I stopped punching around 25 or so, since monsters were
> riposting me for 50+
> damage...
